Text: Glad to see you are still there! Thanks a bunch!

I live in Syria, where we neither can buy nor have enough money to buy those courses. I and a friend have downloaded all of your torrents and regularly share them with friends. I have a few on my mobile phone (video down-scaled using Free make) and watch and listen to them them on my way to work.

Many thanks. You are doing a great good.
